"Wheelchair-accessible vacation package" - Offer a package deal for people with disabilities to travel to an accessible destination with a wheelchair-friendly hotel, transportation, and activities.
"Wheelchair-friendly fitness program" - Create a fitness program specifically designed for individuals in wheelchairs, with modified exercises and equipment that can accommodate their needs.
"Wheelchair-friendly fashion line" - Design a fashion line that caters to people with disabilities, with clothing that is easy to put on and take off, and can be worn in a wheelchair.
"Wheelchair-friendly app" - Develop an app that helps people with disabilities navigate their daily lives, with features such as voice recognition and text-to-speech capabilities.
"Wheelchair-friendly gaming platform" - Create a gaming platform that is accessible to people with disabilities, with features such as voice recognition and adaptive controls.
